text: Folker Bohnet (7 August 1937 – 6 October 2020) was a German actor and theatre director. He was born in Berlin. He was known for his role as Hans in Die Brücke (1959) and as Josef Kainz in Ludwig (1973). Bohnet died on 6 October 2020 in Berlin at the age of 83.Der verzauberte Junge von der Brücke, Nachruf auf der persönlichen Website von Ilja Bohnet, zuletzt abgerufen am 7. Oktober 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:German television directors Category:German theatre directors Category:German playwrights Category:Writers from Berlin Category:Actors from Berlin
title: Folker Bohnet
